message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. Is this a price you're comfortable with?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not comfortable with the price of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm thinking of a price of $16000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $16000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $15500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go down to $15500. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make at least $16500 to make it worth my while. Can you think about meeting me at $16500?

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, Alice, but $16500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $16250. Would you be willing to consider that price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $16250. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make at least $17000 to meet my minimum. Can you think about meeting me at $17000?

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, Alice, but $17000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to make a final offer of $16000, and I hope you can meet me at that price. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the end of the road. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make at least $16500 to meet my minimum. However, I'm also aware that you've made a final offer, and I respect that. I'm willing to meet you at $16500, but this is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
